name: Lifesource+
description:
Originally made for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2021, has been worked on casually for the last several months so here is an updated version. 

Feel free to post comments about any noticeable bugs and if we have time more changes might be made.

Move with A/D (or left and right) and jump with space.

Any damage will scatter your flame, and make your light weaker. But any flames you pick up will make you stronger. 

Oh, did we mention the oxygen that feeds your flame is running out, and you're on a timer?

Hints:

The oxygen bar is your health, it will slowly decrease over time, and taking damage from monsters and traps will also deplete it.

Picking up red flames  from torches will restore some of your health and stoke your flame while also lighting the torch.

All elements in the level glisten in the dark... bot you will have to get close to see what they are. Too close, sometimes.
